CustomField.formula: IF(Text(QA_Reviewed_Timely__c) = "Yes",10,0) + IF(Text( Subject_Line_Updated_to_In_Process__c ) = "Yes",5,0) + IF(Text( Scorecard_Has_Correct_QA_Specialist__c ) = "Yes",5,0) + IF(Text( Scrub_Section_Reviewed_w_Correct_PSS_IS__c ) = "Yes",15,0) + IF(Text( Correct_Items_NotedForCorrections__c ) = "Yes",15,0) + IF(Text(No_Corrections_After_Issue__c) = "Yes",15,0) + IF(Text( Items_Noted_Correctly__c ) = "Yes",15,0) + IF(Text( Burn_Only_Used_When_Required__c ) = "Yes",10,0) + IF(Text( Implementation_Screen_CompletedCorrectly__c ) = "Yes",10,0) + IF(Text(QA_Salesforce_Setup__c) = "Yes",15,0)
CustomField.label: QA Specialist Scorecard Points Earned
